title: If my Elemental HERO Absolute Zero is sent from my opponent's field to the Graveyard or banished face-up, which player will be the one activating its effect?
question: If an Elemental HERO Absolute Zero that I own is sent from my opponent's field to the Graveyard or banished face-up, which player will be the one activating its effect?
answer: Even if your Elemental HERO Absolute Zero is sent to the Graveyard or banished face-up while being controlled by your opponent, you as the original owner will be the one activating its effect to destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
llm_answer: You will be the one activating Elemental HERO Absolute Zero's effect as you are its owner.
